rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with a Vastu-compliant north-east corner placement to invite positivity and prosperity. Includes reception counter for joint family guest interactions.
Spacious living area with Vastu-compliant east-west orientation to enhance family gatherings. Large windows for natural light.
Dining space with central seating and a view of the courtyard. Vastu principles ensure it is located in the southeast sector for abundance.
Multi-functional family room for joint family interactions and events, adhering to Vastu by being oriented in the northeast direction.
Fully equipped kitchen with efficient workflow, located as per Vastu in the south-west area to promote balance and harmony.
Storage and utility space including laundry facilities, located close to kitchen for convenience.
Additional bathroom facility for guests, designed with Vastu alignment in the south direction to ensure proper energy flow.

openings.description: Principal entry point located in the north-east sector, aligning with Vastu for positive energy and security.
Windows leading to the central courtyard ensuring natural light and ventilation while maintaining privacy.
Pathway from living area to swimming pool located in the north-west corner, designed with Vastu principles for calmness and relaxation.
